Subclass/Dual Class Master Raina:
To gain power of the gods must have a certificate for a career change. The certificate was issued to replace the professional heroes long before the fall of Shilen. It is a pity, but now it will not get it.
But if you do get a certificate for a change of profession, come to the state Division for the forces of the gods.
Dual class can not get the power of gods and change class.
